name: Code.Zer0
storyline: While trying to take the test to join the world's largest hacker organization, Morath, you have been hacked, and a virus has messed up your test, creating puzzles that replace the original one. Beat the puzzles and defeat the Zer0 virus to become a member of Morath!
summary: Code.Zer0 is an educational project focused on the basic teaching of programming that was developed in the discipline of Projeto Integrado 1 of the Systems and Digital Media course where the client of the project was Professor George who required a game to be applied in the classroom.
